snippet: Adam & Eve, London, an independent agency opened in 2008, was acquired by DDB Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group, which will merge the agency with DDB United Kingdom, London.
lead_paragraph: Adam & Eve, London, an independent agency opened in 2008, was acquired by DDB Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group, which will merge the agency with DDB United Kingdom, London.

headline.seo: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
